has research problem: capacity of a neural network to absorb information is limited by its number of parameters

has research problem.from sentence: The capacity of a neural network to absorb information is limited by its number of parameters .

Conditional computation , where parts of the network are active on a per-example basis , has been proposed in theory as away of dramatically increasing model capacity without a proportional increase in computation .

has research problem: Conditional computation , where parts of the network are active on a per-example basis

has research problem.from sentence: Conditional computation , where parts of the network are active on a per-example basis , has been proposed in theory as away of dramatically increasing model capacity without a proportional increase in computation .

has research problem: increasing model capacity without a proportional increase in computation

has research problem.from sentence: Conditional computation , where parts of the network are active on a per-example basis , has been proposed in theory as away of dramatically increasing model capacity without a proportional increase in computation .

has research problem: Exploiting scale in both training data and model size

has research problem.from sentence: Exploiting scale in both training data and model size has been central to the success of deep learning .
